name: Redot Design System
description: A comprehensive React-based design system monorepo providing UI components, design tokens, themes, and utilities for building consistent user interfaces in Redot's projects.

@redotlabs/ui.description: Core UI component library with 16+ production-ready React components

components.name: Button
components.usage:
import { Button } from '@redotlabs/ui';

<Button variant="contained" size="md">Click me</Button>

components.name: Calendar
components.description: Interactive calendar component for date selection
components.usage:
import { Calendar } from '@redotlabs/ui';

<Calendar mode="single" selected={date} onSelect={setDate} />

components.name: Checkbox
components.description: Form checkbox input with custom styling

components.name: Input
components.description: Text input field with consistent styling
components.usage:
import { Input } from '@redotlabs/ui';

<Input placeholder="Enter text" value={value} onChange={handleChange} />

components.name: Pagination
components.description: Pagination controls for navigating through pages
components.usage:
import { Pagination } from '@redotlabs/ui';

<Pagination currentPage={page} totalPages={10} onPageChange={setPage} />

components.name: Radio
components.description: Radio button input for single selection
components.usage:
import { Radio } from '@redotlabs/ui';

<Radio value="option1" checked={value === 'option1'} onChange={handleChange} />

components.name: Select
components.description: Dropdown select component with compound components pattern
components.usage:
import { Select, SelectTrigger, SelectValue, SelectContent, SelectItem } from '@redotlabs/ui';

<Select value={value} onValueChange={setValue}>
  <SelectTrigger>
    <SelectValue placeholder="Select an option" />
  </SelectTrigger>
  <SelectContent>
    <SelectItem value="1">Option 1</SelectItem>
    <SelectItem value="2">Option 2</SelectItem>
  </SelectContent>
</Select>

components.name: Table
components.description: Data table component with sorting and pagination
components.usage: import { Table, TableHeader, TableBody, TableRow, TableCell } from '@redotlabs/ui'; ......

components.name: Tabs
components.usage:
import { Tabs, Tab } from '@redotlabs/ui';

<Tabs size="md">
  <Tab isActive={activeTab === 'tab1'} onClick={() => setActiveTab('tab1')}>Tab 1</Tab>
  <Tab isActive={activeTab === 'tab2'} onClick={() => setActiveTab('tab2')}>Tab 2</Tab>
</Tabs>

components.name: Textarea
components.usage:
import { Textarea } from '@redotlabs/ui';

<Textarea placeholder="Enter text" value={value} onChange={handleChange} />

@redotlabs/tokens.description: Design tokens including colors, typography, and spacing

exports.colors: Color palette with primary, secondary, accent, neutral, success, warning, danger, info colors with full scale (100-900)

typography.size: Font size scale from xs to 6xl
typography.weight: Font weight scale from thin (100) to black (900)

@redotlabs/themes.description: Theme provider and theming system with color mode support

components.name: ThemeProvider
components.description: Context provider for theming and color management

components.name: useTheme
components.description: Hook to access and control theme state
components.usage:
import { useTheme } from '@redotlabs/themes';

const { theme, setTheme, color } = useTheme();

@redotlabs/utils.description: Utility functions for className merging and manipulation

functions.name: cn
functions.description: Merge Tailwind CSS classes with conflict resolution
functions.usage:
import { cn } from '@redotlabs/utils';

const className = cn('px-4 py-2', 'px-6', className);

@redotlabs/sdui-renderer.description: Server-Driven UI renderer for dynamic UI generation
@redotlabs/sdui-renderer.note: This package is deprecated and should not be used in new projects

@redotlabs/fonts.description: Font management package for the design system
@redotlabs/fonts.note: Workspace package for managing typography assets

prerequisites: GitHub Personal Access Token (PAT) for package registry access

steps.description: Set GitHub PAT as environment variable

tailwind.description: Configure Tailwind CSS to use design tokens

css.description: Import Tailwind CSS and design system styles

variantSystem.description: Components use Class Variance Authority (CVA) for variant management
variantSystem.pattern: Each component with variants has a separate .variants.ts file

composability.description: Components support asChild prop for composition via Radix UI Slot

styling.description: All components accept className prop for custom styling
styling.utilities: Use cn() from @redotlabs/utils for merging classes

dataAttributes.description: Components include data-slot attributes for testing and styling

imports.recommended: Import components from package root for tree-shaking

theming.colorScheme: Always wrap your app with ThemeProvider to enable dynamic theming
theming.cssVariables: Use CSS custom properties for primary colors: var(--color-primary-600)
theming.darkMode: Dark mode is handled automatically by ThemeProvider

styling.tailwind: Use Tailwind utility classes for custom styling
styling.merging: Always use cn() utility when merging className props
styling.tokens: Prefer design tokens over hardcoded values

accessibility.radix: Components built on Radix UI primitives include accessibility features
accessibility.focus: All interactive components have focus-visible states
accessibility.keyboard: Keyboard navigation is supported out of the box

performance.treeshaking: Import only what you need for optimal bundle size
performance.animations: Animations use will-change-transform for better performance
performance.lazy: Consider lazy loading heavy components like Calendar and DatePicker

scripts.dev: Start development server with hot reload

componentGeneration.description: Generate new components with boilerplate code

versioning.changesets: Automated version management and changelog generation

addingComponent.description: Add a new UI component to the design system
steps: Run pnpm plop to generate component boilerplate
Implement component in packages/ui/src/<component>/
Create variants file if component has variants
Add tests in <component>.test.tsx
Add stories in <component>.stories.tsx
Export from packages/ui/src/index.ts
Update documentation

usingComponent.description: Use a component in your application
steps: Ensure ThemeProvider is set up in your app root
Import component from @redotlabs/ui
Use component with appropriate props and variants
Add custom styling via className if needed
Extend Tailwind config with custom colors/tokens
Use CSS variables for dynamic theming
Pass color prop to ThemeProvider for primary color
Use setTheme from useTheme hook for theme switching

updatingPackages.description: Update design system packages in your project
steps: Check latest versions on GitHub Packages
Update version in package.json
Run pnpm install
Review changelog for breaking changes
Update code if necessary

authentication.solution: Ensure REDOT_PAT environment variable is set with valid GitHub PAT and .npmrc is configured correctly

styling.solution: Verify Tailwind CSS is configured with design tokens and @source directive includes node_modules/@redotlabs/ui

typescript.solution: Ensure @types packages are installed and TypeScript version is compatible

theme.solution: Check ThemeProvider is wrapping your app and CSS variables are defined for primary colors

understanding: This is a monorepo-based React design system using pnpm workspaces and Turborepo
All components are TypeScript-based with full type safety
Styling uses Tailwind CSS 4 with design tokens from @redotlabs/tokens
Component variants are managed using Class Variance Authority (CVA)
Theme management is centralized through @redotlabs/themes package
componentUsage: Always import from package root: import { Button } from '@redotlabs/ui'
Check component variants in .variants.ts files for available options
Use cn() utility when combining className props
Wrap apps with ThemeProvider for theming support
Components support asChild prop for composition patterns
development: Follow existing component structure when adding new components
Include tests (.test.tsx) and stories (.stories.tsx) for new components
Use Plop for generating component boilerplate
Ensure TypeScript types are properly exported
styling: Use design tokens from @redotlabs/tokens instead of hardcoded values
Primary colors use CSS variables: var(--color-primary-{100-900})
Dark mode is handled by ThemeProvider, not manual class toggling
Use Tailwind utilities for spacing, layout, and responsive design
Component variants should use CVA pattern for consistency
fileStructure: Each component in its own directory under packages/ui/src/
